thread.title: ACCESS Regional President Jennifer Miller Elected to San Diego Tourism Authority Board of Directors
thread.title_full: ACCESS Regional President Jennifer Miller Elected to San Diego Tourism Authority Board of Directors

author: PRWEB
title: ACCESS Regional President Jennifer Miller Elected to San Diego Tourism Authority Board of Directors
text:
“San Diego is a dynamic destination that is currently undergoing tremendous growth and I look forward to working together to make visiting San Diego a truly great experience.” San Diego, CA (PRWEB) July 02, 2015
ACCESS Destination Services, one of the most recognized Destination Management and Event Production companies in North America, announced today that ACCESS San Diego Regional President, Jennifer Miller, DMCP, has been elected to the Fiscal Year 2016 San Diego Tourism Authority (SDTA) Board of Directors.
The SDTA Board of Directors is comprised of San Diego tourism industry professionals and community stakeholders who work on behalf of the community to help formulate direction and policies which guide SDTA in fulfilling its mission to drive visitor demand to economically benefit the San Diego region.
Jennifer is a seasoned DMC professional who began her career in the hospitality industry in 1990. As Regional President for ACCESS offices in San Diego, Los Angeles, Arizona and Las Vegas, Jennifer has driven dramatic growth within the company and the San Diego office has very recently been selected as one of “San Diego’s Best Places to Work” by the San Diego Business Journal for the third time.
“I am honored to be a part of this highly esteemed group of industry professionals,” expressed Miller. “San Diego is a dynamic destination that is currently undergoing tremendous growth and I look forward to working together to make visiting San Diego a truly great experience.”
___
Founded in 1969, ACCESS Destination Services sets the standard for excellence in award-winning destination management services throughout North America and the world. Through global alliances with Pacific World and Amstar, ACCESS serves over 100 destinations throughout 30 countries. With global coverage and local expertise, ACCESS meets client objectives and exceeds expectations for corporate, incentive and association groups.
